# 雅可比疊代法 -- 線性方程組求解

* https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jacobi_method

## jacobi.js

```
PS D:\ccc\ccc109a\se\deno\alg\04-iterative_todo\matrixSolve> deno run jacobi.js
x= 0 y= 0
x= 1.2 y= 1.25
x= 0.95 y= 0.95
x= 1.01 y= 1.0125
x= 0.9974999999999999 y= 0.9975

x= 0.999875 y= 0.9998750000000001    
x= 1.000025 y= 1.00003125
x= 0.99999375 y= 0.99999375
x= 1.00000125 y= 1.0000015625        
x= 0.9999996875000001 y= 0.9999996875
x= 1.0000000625 y= 1.000000078125    
x= 0.999999984375 y= 0.999999984375
x= 1.000000003125 y= 1.00000000390625
x= 0.99999999921875 y= 0.99999999921875

```
